headline: Halliburton (HAL) Registers a Bigger Fall Than the Market: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Halliburton (HAL) stood at $30.02, denoting a -1.9% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Halliburton Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Conference Call
summary: HOUSTON, December 05, 2024--Halliburton Company (NYSE: HAL) will host a conference call on Wednesday, January 22, 2025, to discuss its fourth quarter 2024 financial results. The call will begin at 8:00 a.m. CT (9:00 a.m. ET).
